channel.title: TobiasScape v10 [rs-ps official server] [added pics!]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/474/marketguards.png[/img][/center] Please leave a comment what you think or suggestions :P After being in with the private server community for about 3 or 4 years, I have a fair idea of what players want and what makes a good server, I was going to write a server guides with guidelines for people, but knowing this community, an epic base would be much more appealing :) Keep an eye out... Very latest updates:
-[b]NEW SHOPS! If there is a shop with an npc's name in its title/name, that npc will automatically open that shop (no editing of client.java required!)[/b] -Added Fish stall, for stealing noted raw fish, shark being hardest to get obviously, and requiring 90+ thieving to steal from. -Updated market guards so you can still steal from the stall while they attack you, I always found it annoying in real rs the way it stopped you thieving automatically. -Bought vps [1.5gigabyte] for beta testing, and fixed up an auto restarter, downloaded taskkill.exe to server folder as computer doesn't have it. -Made a folder in config/ called 'autospawn', inside 1.cfg, 2.cfg, 0.cfg all containing autospawns, the reason I do this is to prevent corruption and reduce npc related lag to a minimum. -Made a ::playersinring command, which counts the amount of players in the boxing ring, and tells the player. -Modified NPC drops system so you can use the name of the npc instead of the ID -Men drop random pieces of iron armour, one lobster and rarely pieces of the rock-shell armour -Farmers hit very fast (almost double normal attacking speed), and hit up to 8, and drop 1-50k when they die.
Slightly older updates:
-Based off devo 2.7 -All bugs fixed -Lagg reduced -New command system -New item equipping slot system (uses item names instead of ids!) (.cfg files for each slot) -Full stall guards working (only aggressive when you try to steal from stall and your less than two squares away) -Completley new farming with mithril seeds -Rewrote thieving, new, fresh, simple base with no handler -Added boxing ring, with new entering/leaving method, and all proper corners and floors in right place, lighting is correct on the ring also. -Added many weapon effects with graphics -Fixed purple sweets -Added otherworldy being fully, uses black spell -Fixed NPC hitting -Fixed up projectiles -New NPC drops system in NPCHandler.java, simpler, handier and more fun to use. -Added better command system in CustomCommand.java, saves way more space and less hassle. -Added full menu system from winterLove, only because there is no better alternative. -Added rough doors, dissappear when you click them. (isDoor() - client.java) -Modified aggressive NPCs to make code which forces a npc to attack a player -Added chaos druids effect, casts snare at you -Fixed up prayer a bit -Added ::barrages AMOUNT command -Added permenant npc spawning command with walking abilities. -Added easy membership from czar, because it is the easiest to use option, not yet inter- grated fully, although its easy. -Moved npcConfig into the config folder, to make it easier as you can edit all config files in one place -Added weild_requirements.cfg, where you can change the requirements to weild an item using the item's name, instead of id, again saving time. -Done most big fix tutorials on google and moparscape. -Fixed up bank -Added a wide range of items to be stole from the stalls in ardougne -Fixed up pnpc system and added a command ::pnpc NPCID (transforms you into a npc) -Fixed up woodcutting/firemaking -Added itemValue, to return the value of a given item -Ghosts added which cast spell and drop random ghostly robes and 1-5k -Added global objects, and added to packet 210 in addition to 121 to spawn faster and reduce lagg. -Full normal and chocolate cakes :P -Fully working tower guards which actually fire arrows with their bow! -Fixed Thieving stall guards, changed distance from 1 square to 2, so if your standing 2 squares away, but still at the stall, you are no longer safe -Prevented leaving the boxing ring while in combat -Boxing gloves go into the 'gloves' slot, and if you wear them while in the boxing ring, you lose all items when you die, if not, the boxing ring is a fun p-king zone. -Reduced market guards max hit from 8 to 4, as it was simply too high for new players with 10 hp -Purple sweets now stackable! -Removed all daggers from the shields list, and restored the dragon dagger special -Fixed ::gfx ID, ::emote ID -Added some new fun commands, such as ::demon, which transforms player into demon and sets walking and standing emote to the correct demon stance -Wearing a rogue mask prevents you from getting caught stealing by the market guards! -Market guards now drop 1-7.5k and a random item of the steel armour set. -Added ::object, which will either work as ::object ID FACE TYPE, or just ::object TYPE (uses default face=0 and type=10), spawns global object. -Purple sweets now heal a random of, 1-10hp! (more luck involved), game will also tell you how much HP they healed each time in sendMessage. -Updated baking stall to only give one purple sweet randomly, and silk stall only to give a random cash amount between 1-10k -Fixed up market guards, do not glitch any more when you run away from them! (finally perfect market guards!) -Added sigbert's adventurer shop outside bank, sells whip for 1.4m, rogue mask for 2.2m, mithril seeds for 1k each and full enchanted. -Added buy x, only up to 100 though -Fixed up door opening system, can now open diagonal doors too! To come: -Fishing -Fixing up cooking completley, removing handler and reducing amount of code greatly. -Man slaughter minigame, with tonnes of aggressive low level npcs [s]-Choice to lose or keep items in boxing ring[/s] (boxing gloves on/off) -Summon npcs to help you in combat only (no stupid following :D) -Alch all items in inventory -Bank all items in inventory mabye -Mabye a few dungeons for training/exploring -Possibly ice pking dungeon (mining area of blurite dungeon) [s]-5 second timer to leave boxing ring, and can't leave in combat[/s] -Loads of beta testing -Transformation? -Fletching -NPCs randomly drop crystal keys which can be used on a chest to gain a reward (alternative to clue scrolls) -Modified barrows (not in the tunnels the brothers are usually in) -Dragons and fully working anti dragonfire shield -Big scary skeletons -[s]Fish stal[/s]l, (with a better guard?), [s]which you can steal random noted fish from (to save inventory space)[/s] -A crate or something which allows you to turn items in your inventory into gold :) (how much they are worth) (alching without magic)
[center][img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/9523/mapl.png[/img] [img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/3091/newring.png[/img][/center]

item.title: TobiasScape v10 [rs-ps official server] [added pics!]
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

jmood128:

Good luck with the development.

Thanks, it’s almost ready for beta testing I guess, just purchased vps yesterday

cows1471:

Gl but i’m not supporting

Thanks, but saying good luck is still supporting me in a way, whats the difference between you supporting and not supporting? I don’t understand lmao.
Please give reasons so I can improve, i’m trying to make the server as fun as possible, and it will work on any client basically.

Read full topic

item.title: TobiasScape v10 [rs-ps official server] [added pics!]
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

[center][/center]
Please leave a comment what you think or suggestions

After being in with the private server community for about 3 or 4 years, I have a fair idea of what players want and what makes a good server, I was going to write a server guides with guidelines for people, but knowing this community, an epic base would be much more appealing

Keep an eye out…

Very latest updates:

-[b]NEW SHOPS! If there is a shop with an npc's name in its title/name, that npc will automatically open that shop (no editing of client.java required!)[/b] -Added Fish stall, for stealing noted raw fish, shark being hardest to get obviously, and requiring 90+ thieving to steal from. -Updated market guards so you can still steal from the stall while they attack you, I always found it annoying in real rs the way it stopped you thieving automatically. -Bought vps [1.5gigabyte] for beta testing, and fixed up an auto restarter, downloaded taskkill.exe to server folder as computer doesn't have it. -Made a folder in config/ called 'autospawn', inside 1.cfg, 2.cfg, 0.cfg all containing autospawns, the reason I do this is to prevent corruption and reduce npc related lag to a minimum. -Made a ::playersinring command, which counts the amount of players in the boxing ring, and tells the player. -Modified NPC drops system so you can use the name of the npc instead of the ID -Men drop random pieces of iron armour, one lobster and rarely pieces of the rock-shell armour -Farmers hit very fast (almost double normal attacking speed), and hit up to 8, and drop 1-50k when they die.

Slightly older updates:

-Based off devo 2.7 -All bugs fixed -Lagg reduced -New command system -New item equipping slot system (uses item names instead of ids!) (.cfg files for each slot) -Full stall guards working (only aggressive when you try to steal from stall and your less than two squares away) -Completley new farming with mithril seeds -Rewrote thieving, new, fresh, simple base with no handler -Added boxing ring, with new entering/leaving method, and all proper corners and floors in right place, lighting is correct on the ring also. -Added many weapon effects with graphics -Fixed purple sweets -Added otherworldy being fully, uses black spell -Fixed NPC hitting -Fixed up projectiles -New NPC drops system in NPCHandler.java, simpler, handier and more fun to use. -Added better command system in CustomCommand.java, saves way more space and less hassle. -Added full menu system from winterLove, only because there is no better alternative. -Added rough doors, dissappear when you click them. (isDoor() - client.java) -Modified aggressive NPCs to make code which forces a npc to attack a player -Added chaos druids effect, casts snare at you -Fixed up prayer a bit -Added ::barrages AMOUNT command -Added permenant npc spawning command with walking abilities. -Added easy membership from czar, because it is the easiest to use option, not yet inter- grated fully, although its easy. -Moved npcConfig into the config folder, to make it easier as you can edit all config files in one place -Added weild_requirements.cfg, where you can change the requirements to weild an item using the item's name, instead of id, again saving time. -Done most big fix tutorials on google and moparscape. -Fixed up bank -Added a wide range of items to be stole from the stalls in ardougne -Fixed up pnpc system and added a command ::pnpc NPCID (transforms you into a npc) -Fixed up woodcutting/firemaking -Added itemValue, to return the value of a given item -Ghosts added which cast spell and drop random ghostly robes and 1-5k -Added global objects, and added to packet 210 in addition to 121 to spawn faster and reduce lagg. -Full normal and chocolate cakes :P -Fully working tower guards which actually fire arrows with their bow! -Fixed Thieving stall guards, changed distance from 1 square to 2, so if your standing 2 squares away, but still at the stall, you are no longer safe -Prevented leaving the boxing ring while in combat -Boxing gloves go into the 'gloves' slot, and if you wear them while in the boxing ring, you lose all items when you die, if not, the boxing ring is a fun p-king zone. -Reduced market guards max hit from 8 to 4, as it was simply too high for new players with 10 hp -Purple sweets now stackable! -Removed all daggers from the shields list, and restored the dragon dagger special -Fixed ::gfx ID, ::emote ID -Added some new fun commands, such as ::demon, which transforms player into demon and sets walking and standing emote to the correct demon stance -Wearing a rogue mask prevents you from getting caught stealing by the market guards! -Market guards now drop 1-7.5k and a random item of the steel armour set. -Added ::object, which will either work as ::object ID FACE TYPE, or just ::object TYPE (uses default face=0 and type=10), spawns global object. -Purple sweets now heal a random of, 1-10hp! (more luck involved), game will also tell you how much HP they healed each time in sendMessage. -Updated baking stall to only give one purple sweet randomly, and silk stall only to give a random cash amount between 1-10k -Fixed up market guards, do not glitch any more when you run away from them! (finally perfect market guards!) -Added sigbert's adventurer shop outside bank, sells whip for 1.4m, rogue mask for 2.2m, mithril seeds for 1k each and full enchanted. -Added buy x, only up to 100 though -Fixed up door opening system, can now open diagonal doors too!

To come:
-Fishing
-Fixing up cooking completley, removing handler and reducing amount of code greatly.
-Man slaughter minigame, with tonnes of aggressive low level npcs
-Choice to lose or keep items in boxing ring (boxing gloves on/off)
-Summon npcs to help you in combat only (no stupid following :D)
-Alch all items in inventory
-Bank all items in inventory mabye
-Mabye a few dungeons for training/exploring
-Possibly ice pking dungeon (mining area of blurite dungeon)
-5 second timer to leave boxing ring, and can’t leave in combat
-Loads of beta testing
-Transformation?
-Fletching
-NPCs randomly drop crystal keys which can be used on a chest to gain a reward
(alternative to clue scrolls)
-Modified barrows (not in the tunnels the brothers are usually in)
-Dragons and fully working anti dragonfire shield
-Big scary skeletons
-Fish stall, (with a better guard?), which you can steal random noted fish from (to save inventory space)
-A crate or something which allows you to turn items in your inventory into gold (how much they are worth) (alching without magic)


[center]
[/center]

Read full topic
